items.badge_description:
The beer style with the most annual check-ins definitely deserves its own party, don’t you think?

In 2023, Sierra Nevada had the brilliant idea to create a day of celebration for hazies, and we gotta tip our cap to their brilliant idea! 

This year, we’re excited to introduce our second iteration of the Hazy IPA Day badge.

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 5 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 2!
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 5 beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 2.

The beer style with the most annual check-ins definitely deserves its own party, don’t you think?

In 2023, Sierra Nevada had the brilliant idea to create a day of celebration for hazies, and we gotta tip our cap to their brilliant idea! 

This year, we’re excited to introduce our second iteration of the Hazy IPA Day badge.
Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 95 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 20.

The beer style with the most annual check-ins definitely deserves its own party, don’t you think?

In 2023, Sierra Nevada had the brilliant idea to create a day of celebration for hazies, and we gotta tip our cap to their brilliant idea! 

This year, we’re excited to introduce our second iteration of the Hazy IPA Day badge.

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 180 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 37!

Hoppy IPA Day!

Did you know that, since our inception in 2010, our hoppy lil’ community has checked in over 400 million IPAs? That’s a seriously staggering amount of hops!⁠

items.checkin_comment: Creamy palate, piney bitterness rounding out the back. Grapefruit overpowers the rest of the flavour profile.

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 355 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 72!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 490 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 99!
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least That's 445 distinct venues!
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 10 distinct venues!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 50 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 11!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 50 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 11!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 90 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 19! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 370 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 75!

items.checkin_comment: Easy drinking IPA. Would be a good for a session

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 225 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 46!

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 85 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 18!

items.checkin_comment: A sunny winter arvo in midst of well needed rainy spell. To accompany the sunshine, a brew with a very sizeable citrus & grapefruit hit without being too sharp. Nicely hopped with balancing bitterness in the finish. Top marks!

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 360 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 73!

beer.beer_name: Kate & Jason: Love That's Beer To Stay
